name: BitState
description:
BitState is an experimental digital state where every citizen has an NFT identity and can vote on laws as well as propose new initiatives. The cryptocurrency BTST serves as the economic foundation, facilitating transactions and project financing. We rely on the blockchain to ensure a democratic and secure governance.

Every decision—whether it’s passing a law, financing a project, or appointing an advisor—is made through a transparent and decentralized vote.The goal is to create an autonomous community, free to innovate and define its own political, economic, and social model.
